overview:
Staffan is responsible for the daily operations and overall business processes for Preview Networks.

Staffan has a profound understanding of sales and operations in the entertainment industry after having worked at key positions in this space for more than 10 years, being responsible for clients such as Universal Pictures International and Paramount Pictures. Prior to Preview Networks, Staffan worked for many years as Head of Acquisitions and Head of Theatrical Distribution at Scandinavian film distributor Noble Entertainment where he managed all aspects of distribution and marketing across the Scandinavian markets.

Staffan holds a Master of Science Degree in International Business from the Stockholm School of Economics in Sweden. Staffan speaks Swedish, English and Spanish.
